The Car Is Born: A Documentary About Carl & Bertha Benz Trailer

The automobile was invented 125 years ago by Carl Benz. To do so he had to overcome a broad range of engineering obstacles as well as tremendous resistance laid in his path by the government AND by the church... See full synopsis Âť
